titles.title: 248 Blessed Be God, Our God (not easy tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessed be God our God
Who gave for us
His well-be-loved Son
The gift of gifts
All other gifts in one
Blessed be god our God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
What will He not bestow
Who freely gave
This mighty Gift
Unbought unmerited
Unheeded and unsought
What will He not bestow

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He spared not His Son
'Tis this that silences
Each rising fear
'Tis this that bids
The hard tho't disappear
He spared not His Son

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Who shall condemn us now
Since Christ has died
And ris'n and gone above
For us to plead
At the right hand of Love
Who shall condemn us now

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
'Tis God that justifies
Who shall recall
His pardon or His grace
Or who the broken
Chain of guilt replace
'Tis God that justifies

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
The victory is ours
For us in might came forth
The mighty One
For us He fought
The fight the triumph won
The victory is ours
